oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Strike It Rich - 1956-08-21
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Radio quiz show during which downtrodden contestants tell their stories, answer simple questions, and are given financial help. Featuring announcer Mort Lawrence (filling in for Ralph Paul), host Warren Hull, and producer Walt Framer. Sponsored by Colgate.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening theme -- Opening statement (Mort Lawrence) -- Opening statement (Warren Hull) -- Fab jingle -- Mort Lawrence introduces the 'Colgate Fortune Find' -- Warren Hull interviews the contestants -- Round of game show -- Ajax jingle -- Warren Hull talks about the Newspaperman's award -- Mort Lawrence introduces the next contestant -- Warren Hull interviews the contestant -- Round of game show -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Warren Hull) -- Closing statement (Mort Lawrence)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Hull, Warren, 1903-1974; Paul, Ralph, 1920-1987; Lawrence, Mort
